alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Trout River; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 29 at 2:50AM EST until January 30 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. * WHERE...Inland St. Johns, Inland Flagler, Eastern Clay, Eastern Putnam, Eastern Marion, Trout River, Central Marion and Western Marion Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Trout River; Western Marion
